verifyShipper.title: Verify Shipper
verifyShipper.heading: Scan LN2 Shipper
verifyShipper.scanCoi: Scan or enter the COI Number found on the LN2 shipper label.

shipmentReceiptChecklist.title: Shipment Receipt Checklist
shipmentReceiptChecklist.heading: Condition and Details of Shipment
shipmentReceiptChecklist.sectionDescription: Complete this section prior to opening the LN2 shipper. Document the checks performed, actions taken, and the condition of the shipment upon arrival at the manufacturing facility.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.shipperCaseIntactQuestion: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC logistics.
shipmentReceiptChecklist.shipperLabelPlacedQuestion: Is the shipper label(s) included with the shipper?
shipmentReceiptChecklist.consigneeKitPouchQuestion: Is the Consignee kit pouch included with the shipper?
shipmentReceiptChecklist.enterEvoIdNumber: Please enter the last 4-digits of the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid
shipmentReceiptChecklist.textEnoIsNumberQuestion: Does the EVO-IS Number listed on the Air Waybill match the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shipmentReceiptChecklist.redWireTamperSealQuestion: Is the Red Wire Tamper Seal in place for the LN2 shipper lid?
shipmentReceiptChecklist.enterTamperSealNumber: Please enter the Tamper Seal Number on LN2 shipper lid
shipmentReceiptChecklist.tamperSealMatchQuestion: Does the Tamper Seal Number listed on the Air Waybill match the Tamper Seal Number on the LN2 shipper lid?

shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.title: Shipment Receipt Checklist Summary
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.airwayBillNumber: Airway bill number or shipment tracking identification
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.shippingContainerIntact: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC logistics.
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.shipperLabelIncluded: Is the shipper label(s) included with the shipper?
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.consigneeKitPouchIncluded: Is the Consignee kit pouch included with the shipper?
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.enterEvoIsNumber: Please enter the last 4-digits of the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.evoIsNumberMatch: Does the EVO-IS Number listed on the Air Waybill match the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.redWireTamperSealInPlace: Is the Red Wire Tamper Seal in place for the LN2 shipper lid?
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.tamperSealNumberOnShipperLid: Please enter the Tamper Seal Number on LN2 shipper lid
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.tamperSealNumberMatch: Does the Tamper Seal Number listed on the Air Waybill match the Tamper Seal Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.confirmerPrompt: I confirm that the information entered is complete and accurate.
shippingReceiptChecklistSummary.verifierPrompt: I verify that the information entered is complete and accurate.

transferProduct1.title: Transfer Product to Intermediary or Final LN2 Storage
transferProduct1.description1: If Intermediary Storage is used – steps for the transfer of bag/cassette from intermediary storage to LN2 freezer is captured on the next page
transferProduct1.description2: IMPORTANT: Please place the cryopreserved apheresis material into liquid nitrogen storage as soon as possible upon receipt and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.
transferProduct1.bagDescription: Remove cassette 1 and bag 1 from the LN2 shipper and scan the LN2 shipper label to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage and scan to capture the time of this step.
transferProduct1.scanCoiOnShipper: Scan the COI on the LN2 shipper
transferProduct1.scanCoiOnCassette: Scan the COI on the cassette label
transferProduct1.scanCoiOnBag: Scan the COI on the bag

transferProduct2.title: Transfer Product to Intermediary or Final LN2 Storage
transferProduct2.description: If intermediary storage is used, scan each cassette as it is removed from intermediary storage, then scan the shipper label once as the cassettes are placed into LN2 storage
transferProduct2.scanCoiOnCassette: Scan the COI on the cassette label
transferProduct2.scanCoiOnShipper: Scan or enter the COI on the LN2 shipper label

productReceipt.title: Product Receipt
productReceipt.ambientTemperatureQuestion: Confirm cryopreserved apheresis product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes.
productReceipt.sealInPlaceQuestion: Was the tamper evident seal in place on the cassette rack?
productReceipt.expectedConditionQuestion: Is each bag and cassette in the expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact Janssen for further instructions.
productReceipt.freeFromCracksQuestion: Is the bag free from cracks, openings, or other visible damage that could potentially compromise the integrity of the material? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC for further instructions.
productReceipt.placedIntoStorageQuestion: Has the cryopreserved apheresis product been placed into storage as per the cassette label: Store at ≤-120°C (-184°F), vapor phase of liquid nitrogen? This should be done even if there are any issues with the shipment.
productReceipt.enterAdditionalComments: Please enter additional comments about the receipt: (Optional)

productReceiptSummary.title: Product Receipt Summary
productReceiptSummary.airwayBillNumber: Airway bill number or shipment tracking identification
productReceiptSummary.scanCoiOnShipper: Scan the COI on the LN2 shipper
productReceiptSummary.scanCoiOnCassette: Scan the COI on the cassette label
productReceiptSummary.scanCoiOnBag: Scan the COI on the bag
productReceiptSummary.scanDescription: Scan is displayed if intermediary storage is used
productReceiptSummary.scanCoiOnCassetteLabel: Scan the COI on the cassette label
productReceiptSummary.scanCoiOnShipperLabel: Scan or enter the COI on the LN2 shipper label
productReceiptSummary.ambientTemperature: Confirm cryopreserved apheresis product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes.
productReceiptSummary.sealInPlace: Was the tamper evident seal in place on the cassette rack?
productReceiptSummary.expectedCondition: Is each bag and cassette in the expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact Janssen for further instructions.
productReceiptSummary.freeFromCracks: Is the bag free from cracks, openings, or other visible damage that could potentially compromise the integrity of the material? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC for further instructions.
productReceiptSummary.placedIntoStorage: Has the cryopreserved apheresis product been placed into storage as per the cassette label: Store at ≤-120°C (-184°F), vapor phase of liquid nitrogen? This should be done even if there are any issues with the shipment.

confirmationOfLabelApplication1.title: Confirmation of Label Application
confirmationOfLabelApplication1.selectLabelSize: Select label size attached to bag.
confirmationOfLabelApplication1.confirmBagLabelsAttached: Confirm bag labels have been attached to bag.

confirmationOfLabelApplication2.title: Confirmation of Label Application
confirmationOfLabelApplication2.scanCoiOnBag: Scan or enter the COI with bag identifier on bag 1.
confirmationOfLabelApplication2.scanCoiOnCassette: Scan or enter the COI with bag identifier on cassette 1.
confirmationOfLabelApplication2.confirmLabelReconciliation: Remaining labels have been returned to Quality for reconciliation as per TV-SOP-41519 Confirmed

confirmationOfLabelApplicationIS.selectLabelSize: Select label size attached to bag.
confirmationOfLabelApplicationIS.confirmBagLabelsAttached: Confirm bag labels have been attached to bag.

confirmationOfLabelApplicationIS.scanCoiOnCassette: Scan or enter the COI with bag identifier on cassette 1.

qualityRelease.title: Quality Release
qualityRelease.name: Name
qualityRelease.verifyProductShipped: I verify that this product is approved to ship.
qualityRelease.confirmerPrompt: I confirm that the information entered is complete and accurate.

bagSelection.title: Bag Selection
bagSelection.description: Indicate which bags you will be shipping for infusion and which bags will not be shipped. Bags that are selected for shipping will be scanned as part of the Shipping Checklist.

transferProductToShipper.title: Transfer Product To Shipper
transferProductToShipper.containerCaseIntactQuestion: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen CSC.
transferProductToShipper.temperatureOutOfRangeQuestion: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, contact Janssen CSC immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given.
transferProductToShipper.description: IMPORTANT: Please place the investigational product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.
transferProductToShipper.bagDescription: Remove cassette 1 from storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Next, transfer the cassette into the LN2 shipper and scan the COI number on the LN2 shipper label to capture the timestamp of this step.
transferProductToShipper.scanCoiOnCassette: Scan or enter the COI bag identifier on Cassette 1.
transferProductToShipper.scanCoiOnCassetteLclp: Scan or enter the COI with bag identifier on Cassette 1.
transferProductToShipper.scanCoiOnCassetteCccpJp: Scan or enter the COI with bag identifier on Cassette 1.
transferProductToShipper.scanCoiOnCassetteUs: Scan or enter the COI with bag identifier on Cassette 1.
transferProductToShipper.scanCoiOnShipper: Scan or enter the COI number on the shipper label
